overview:
For Sale By Owner listing in flat fee MLS is not only meant for investors, but is also meant for all home owners who really look to save some money for them. Saving money for bad times is every oneâ€™s wish and listing as for sale by owner fulfils this for any property owner. If we look around us every second home these days is listed in MLS listing as for sale by owner and gets sold in quick time. In the same way flat fee MLS has grown a lot in popularity among home owners which has really saved them thousands of dollars.

For once try to think of people whom you know and have sold their property in traditional way. You will see that they spent a lot of time entertaining the buyers or buyersâ€™ agent. Not only they had to spent hell of a time but also had to spend a lot in placing advertisements and distributing flyers. This is totally adverse with the home owners who have listed in MLS listing and that too as for sale by owner with Continental Real Estate Group. They had to spend very less time showing every now and then to potential buyers and saved huge sum in paying sales commission. We all know that MLS listing has been in demand with home owners either looking to sell or rent and they have gained in double by listing the same as for sale by owner.

When you list as for sale by owner in flat fee MLS there is no interference of any real estate agent. You are your own boss to decide the price you want to sell your property at leaving enough room to negotiate the price with the buyer as well. You just need to be firm in deciding the price of your property you want to list in flat fee MLS. This can be done by doing simple market research or some time spent on browsing top real estate sites. Once you decide on the price to sell your property you can be in touch with MLS listing agent Continental Real Estate Group who will help in doing all the paper work and uploading the images of your property to be sold.

To list in flat fee MLS as for sale by owner Continental Real Estate Group charges you a flat fee as upfront which is very low as compare to placing ads in local newspapers. Continental Real Estate Group offers great MLS listing offers to list as for sale by owner that would cost $349 for six month listing period. In this flat fee MLS listing package your property gets listed with images for six months and also added to national MLS listing sites database. When you list your property in flat fee MLS there is no interference of any broker which saves you a lot which you would pay to any real estate agent. Even if you pay to buyersâ€™ agent you can negotiate the same on your own with the broker. To see the real difference list as for sale by owner in MLS listing and you might end up saving a huge amount of money.

For more info to list as for sale by owner in MLS listing visit Continental Real Estate Group www.ownerama.com , www.multiplelistingsystem.com , www.mls2u.com .
